ext_weather.name: This Afternoon
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 4pm. Cloudy, with a high near 43. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
